summary: A fluid, unconnected and sometimes chaotic procession of scenes detailing the various people and events of life in Italy's capital, most of it based on director Federico Fellini's life.
cast: Peter Gonzales Falcon|Fiona Florence|Britta Barnes|Pia De Doses|Marne Maitland|Renato Giovannoli|Elisa Mainardi|Galliano Sbarra|Anna Magnani|Ginette Marcelle Bron|Stefano Mayore|Alfredo Adami|Sbarra Adami|Bireno|Luisa Bixio|Aristide Caporale|Angelo Casadei|Feodor Chaliapin Jr.|Gianluigi Chirizzi|Dennis Christopher|Franco Citti|Dante Cleri|Nancy Cohen|Angela De Leo|Olga De Marco|Rolando De Santis|Maria De Sisti|Mario Del Vago|Francesco Di Giacomo|Alberigo Donadeo|John P. Dulaney|Andrea Fantasia|Federico Fellini|Libero Frissi|Nella Gambini|Norma Giacchero|Veriano Ginesi|Eleonora Giorgi|Gudrun Mardou Khiess|John Francis Lane|Franco Magno|Loredana Martinez|Ettore Martini|Marcello Mastroianni|Chuck McCann|Adalberto Maria Merli|Elliott Murphy|Paola Natale|Ada Passari|Raout Paule|Fulvio Pellegrino|Anna Maria Pescatori|Cassandra Peterson|Mimmo Poli|Marie Párová|Alessandro Quasimodo|Ivana Rumor|Giovanni Serboli|Alberto Sordi|Guglielmo Spoletini|Nino Terzo|Franco Venditti|Gore Vidal|Alvaro Vitali|Renato Zero
title: Roma
